name: Sirmaur
description: Sirmaur is a district in Himachal Pradesh known for its rich cultural heritage, ancient temples, and scenic beauty. The district is famous for its traditional dance forms and the annual Sair Festival.
summary: A cultural paradise in the lap of the Himalayas

locations.name: Nahan
locations.description: Historic town known for its clean streets, colonial architecture, and scenic views.

locations.name: Renuka Lake
locations.description: Largest natural lake in Himachal Pradesh, surrounded by temples and scenic beauty.

locations.name: Paonta Sahib
locations.description: Historic town known for its Sikh gurdwara and scenic views of the Yamuna River.
locations.address: Paonta Sahib, Sirmaur District, Himachal Pradesh

locations.name: Suketi Fossil Park
locations.description: Unique park showcasing life-size fiberglass models of prehistoric animals.

locations.name: Churdhar Peak
locations.description: Highest peak in the outer Himalayas, offering stunning views and trekking opportunities.
locations.hours: Best time: March to June, September to November
